Privacy Policy

Last updated:

Remaleh Protect respects your privacy. This policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your choices. We collect only what is necessary to provide our services (e.g., account email, reports you submit) and never sell personal data.

Information We Collect

  • Account information: email, name (if provided), role.
  • Community reports and associated media you upload.
  • Learning progress and interactions within the app.
  • Diagnostic logs for performance and error monitoring.

How We Use Information

  • To operate and improve Remaleh Protect features.
  • To moderate community content and keep users safe.
  • To send essential notifications (e.g., verification, password reset).
  • To comply with legal obligations.

Third-Party Services

We use trusted providers like Amazon SES (email), Cloudinary (media storage), and Google/Apple (OAuth). These providers process data only to deliver our services and under their policies.

Your Choices

  • You may access, update, or delete your account data from Profile Settings.
  • You can delete your own community reports and associated media.
  • Contact us to request data export or deletion.

Contact

For privacy questions or requests, contact: support@remaleh.com.au.
